rules.name: X72_H
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 7) OR (2 AND 7) OR (3 AND (7 OR 8 OR 9)) OR (4 AND (7 OR 10)) OR (5 AND (7 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14)) OR (6 AND (7 OR 10))
